description:
In these next shorts, mom is shocked that Bunji has poor hiragana recognition. In different efforts, she finally decides to help him improve but sometimes gets a bit impatient.  Fumi absolutely loves batman and throws her batman figurine out when she discovers he has a girlfriend. Mom has promised to take Bunji and Fumi to the park this Sunday but her body is so tired that Bunji and Fumi decide to…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Descent of the Spirit / The Descent of the Spirit / Look at me! / Brother and Sister
精霊降臨 / 精霊の逆襲 / わたしをみて! / 兄妹
